text: @realDonaldTrump Stock Market reflects only the wealthy and is completely a disconnect from the failing economy and 42,000,000 unemployed. 108,000 are  dead and almost 2 million sick from covid-19 and protests all over the country against your RACIST POLICIES. #TrumpsAmericanCarnage
